name: SnapWords Quiz Game
description:
Welcome to the SnapWords Quiz Game!

snap words (n, pl): words that are quickly recognizable by sight (in a snap!) without the reader having to sound the word out first.

Listen to the word. Then select the word that matches. This game offers a fun and engaging way to practice snap word recognition through gameplay, helping to increase snap word familiarity while improving recognition speed.

The SnapWords Quiz Game is an early learning game for young readers. Appropriate for all ages. Intended for children aged 3 to 7 years. Users are recommended to have some level of proficiency with the English alphabet, letter sounds, and combination letter sounds.

Your support is appreciated. Thank you for playing!
